original: kshu kshu se ri kunda ri s'a dha nam /
analyzed: kshu kshu se ri kunda ri s'a dha nam /

original: kshu kshu se ri kunda'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: kshu kshu se ri kunda'i sgrub thabs /

original: na mo pi sh'a tsa ni kshu kshu se ri kunda ri sv'a h'a /
analyzed: na mo pi sh'a tsa ni kshu kshu se ri kunda ri sv'a h'a /

original: zhes so // dur khrod kyi sol bas khang pa'i shar phyogs kyi rtsig pa la 'dre mo'i gzugs bris te /
analyzed: zhes so // dur khrod kyi sol bas khang pa'i shar phyogs kyi rtsig pa la 'dre mo'i gzugs bris te /
translated: With charnel ground ash, draw the form of a demoness on the eastern wall of the house.🔽Do not light a fire inside.

original: de'i nang me mi gtang bar byas te nyi ma @159a * //
analyzed: de'i nang me mi gtang bar byas te nyi ma @159a * //

original: rgas pa dang gzugs de'i mdun du 'dug ste /
analyzed: rgas pa dang gzugs de'i mdun du 'dug ste /
translated: sets, sit in front of that form.

original: de'i mgo la lag pa bzhag la brgyad kyis lhag pa'i stong phrag gcig bzlas nas /
analyzed: de'i mgo la lag pa bzhag la brgyad kyis lhag pa'i stong phrag gcig bzlas nas /
translated: Place your hand on its head and recite one thousand and eight times.

original: de'i drung du nyal bas zhag dang po la dur khrod kyi dri snom par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i drung du nyal bas zhag dang po la dur khrod kyi dri snom par 'gyur ro //
translated: Sleep in front of it. On the first night, you will smell the odor of a charnel ground.

original: gnyis pa la aa ga ru la sogs pa bdug spos kyi dri snom bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnyis pa la aa ga ru la sogs pa bdug spos kyi dri snom bar 'gyur ro //
translated: On the second night, you will smell the odor of incense such as agarwood.

original: gsum pa la lus la reg bya 'jam pa skyed par byed do //
analyzed: gsum pa la lus la reg bya 'jam pa skyed par byed do //
translated: On the third night, it will produce a soft touch on your body.

original: de la mi 'gul bar shing sdong ltar bsdad de de rang nub mo nas 'grub par 'gyur bas /
analyzed: de la mi 'gul bar shing sdong ltar bsdad de de rang nub mo nas 'grub par 'gyur bas /
translated: Having remained there without moving like a tree trunk, one will accomplish it that very night.

original: 'gron bu pa ni brgyad ster ro //
analyzed: 'gron bu pa ni brgyad ster ro //
translated: The guest will give eight cowries.

original: kshu kshu se ri kunda'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: kshu kshu se ri kunda'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The sādhana of Kṣu Kṣu Serikundā is complete.
